text: Kazhutʹ, "Chyye svidchennya yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy?" Skazhitʹ, "BOZHYY. Vin yavlyaye soboyu svidka mizh meni ta vas shcho tse Quran ye nadykhnute meni, shchob propoviduvaty tse do vas ta whomever tse prostyahayetʹsya. Diysno, vy dayete svidchennya shcho ye inshi bohy bilya BOHA." Skazhitʹ, "ya ne svidchu tomu shcho vy; ye tilʹky odyn boh, ta ya vidmovlyayusya vash idolatry
